name: LUMINOSITY (itch) (SillySealStudio)
description: LUMINOSITY is a 2D top-down turn-based story-driven RPG. Our protagonist, Ven, is the leader of Lumino City, when suddenly, enemies attack. Ven was ready to go down with his people, but his clan pretty much begged him to leave and survive, and he obliged. But with a goal, to rebuild his forces and take back his city.
